page.title: 10The Bosden Farm Estate.
page.content: {Bosden Farm Estate}is a modern housing estate with many different kinds of houses:{detached, {semi-detached, terraced and bungalows. The estate is jam-packed with houses some of which are unusual.There is a {house and a bungalow}joined together with a long sloping roof. The builders are still working on the estate. There are a{few shops}and a{small {supermarket, a pub}called The Harvester, a{new school}already opened and another one planned. Most of the streets are named after birds.There are not many play areas. One is called{Poise Brook Park with swings and a climbing frame; {Peregrin Park}and the{Bonkin,}an uncultivated area of long grass. Children also play on the{school {field}which is not really allowed and at the side of the pub
